---
name: Bug report
about: Create a bug report to help us improve
title: " "
labels: bug
assignees: ''
---

#### Bug description
Add a clear and concise description of what the bug is, who or what is
involved, what is the expected behaviour ... anything that you think will help
with understanding and fixing the bug.

Check the log for any relevant warnings or errors and copy them here. If
applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

In case of complicated bugs or hard to reach situations, please provide a save
game, so we can reproduce the problem more easily.

**Please describe one bug only** and open new reports for others.

#### Steps to reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error
